summary: Just a small change in weight to teleportation scrolls.
descriptionHtml:
Like the title states, this changes the weight of teleportation scrolls in Enderal to zero (0). Obviously not lore-friendly, I'm just a lazy gamer that doesn't like scrolls to take up weight that could be used for hella rad loot. /s

[u]INSTALLATION:
[/u]Unzip the file and drop it into the Skyrim/Data file. Simple as that.

[u]PLEASE NOTE:Â 
[/u]You [b][i][u]must[/u] [/i][/b]have Enderal by SureAI installed first, otherwise bad sh*t will happen to your game. You have been warned.

[u]Credits:
[/u]SureAI for Enderal
Bethesda for the CK
author: sneklemore
